algorithm_technique: Mathematical insight: incrementing n-1 elements is equivalent to decrementing 1 element relative to the minimum.
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum moves to make all array elements equal by incrementing n-1 elements.
problem_summary_technical: The total number of moves is the sum of all elements minus n times the minimum element.
key_insights: The key insight is that incrementing n-1 elements by 1 is mathematically equivalent to decrementing the remaining 1 element by 1, relative to the target value.
Therefore, the problem reduces to finding the sum of differences between each element and the minimum element.
This is because the minimum element will be the final target value after all operations.
